review: Absolutely awesome! If you love Amazon content, you need this.
author: Joshua C Green

review: I absolutely love this! It was easy to set up and worked right out of the box. Having the remote is pretty awesome. I'm sure it's easy to download the app to your phone, but it's nice not to have to rely on your phone to work it. I've been a Netflix watching fiend ever since! I'm a Prime member and I hadn't really explored streaming on Prime, but this makes it so easy. Would definitely recommend!
author: lovememybargains

review: So easy and very cool.  Before getting the Fire TV stick, I used my bluray to stream Amazon and then Roku's, including the Roku stick.  The fire stick so far is the best.  All my Amazon content is there, it's easy to navigate, and the remote features are sleek and fit nicely in my hand.  This was so simple to set up, I took it out of the box, plugged it in, and everything was there.  Very satisfied!
author: Genie

review: It was very easy to get started. No boxes just a plug in. I like the selection of movies and shows. However,  the fact that you need to have cable subscriptions to watch several of the channels of which I don't have makes it a little frustrating.  Other than that it's fun and entertaining to have.
author: j.mosley

review: Wow!Amazing product. Got yesterday. I am not tech savvy but this was so easy to set up. I have done Netflix, Amazon Prime, Showtime and even downliaded pics from my ipad. The remote is so handy.I downloaded the app on an android tablet but the ipad one is coming soon.I have chromecast and good for a couple things but the scope of this is much wider. If u like movies,etc. u need to buy this. A small price for a great device!
